mapper.select: SELECT model, reserve_date, agency_name, approval_num, no FROM driver_reserve WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE driver_reserve SET approval_num=1 WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT estimate_date, car_estimate.estimate_total_price as my_totalPrice, car_trim.trim_name as my_trim_name, car_model.model_name as my_model_name, car.car_name as my_car_name, car.car_poster as my_car_poster FROM car_estimate, car_trim, car_model, car WHERE car_estimate.id=#{id} AND car_estimate.trim_num=car_trim.trim_num AND car_trim.model_num=car_model.model_num AND car_model.car_num=car.car_num ORDER BY estimate_date desc
